00033 int intHDASS_FUNCTION_STATE;
00034 HDASSGlobalSetting GlobalSetting;

00036     I18N_NOOP("A KDE KPart Application");
00037 
00038 static const char version[] = "0.1";

00041 {
00042 //    { "+[URL]", I18N_NOOP( "Document to open." ), 0 },
00043     KCmdLineLastOption

00046 void HDASS_INIT()
00047 {
00048   intHDASS_FUNCTION_STATE=em_internet;
00049 }
00050 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00051 {
00052     KAboutData about("hdass08", I18N_NOOP("HDASS08"), version, description,
00053                      KAboutData::License_GPL, "(C) 2005 sonicat", 0, 0, "is87098@cis.nctu.edu.tw");
00054     about.addAuthor( "sonicat", 0, "is87098@cis.nctu.edu.tw" );
00055     KCmdLineArgs::init(argc, argv, &about);
00056     KCmdLineArgs::addCmdLineOptions( options );
00057     KApplication app;
00058     HDASS08 *mainWin = 0;
00059 
00060     if (app.isRestored())
00061     {
00062         RESTORE(HDASS08);
00063     }
00064     else
00065     {
00066         // no session.. just start up normally
00067         KCmdLineArgs *args = KCmdLineArgs::parsedArgs();
00068 
00069         //DAVID HDASS Logo Init Here//
00070         KStartupLogo* HDASS_logo=NULL;
00071         HDASS_logo = new KStartupLogo();
00072         HDASS_logo->show();
00073         
00074         //Init All HDASS Setting 
00075         HDASS_INIT();
00076         
00077         mainWin = new HDASS08();
00078         mainWin->setGeometry(0,0,800,600);
00079         
00080         //DAVID this connection let HDASS_logo to trigger the mainWin
00081         QObject::connect(HDASS_logo,SIGNAL(signalTriggerMainWidget()),mainWin,SLOT(slotShow()));
00082         
00083  
00084         //mainWin->show();
00085          
00086         args->clear();
00087     }
00088 
00089     // mainWin has WDestructiveClose flag by default, so it will delete itself.
00090     return app.exec();
00091 }
